analysis.description:
RBAC.roles (/unique_chucks/31/0x29fdf8058fdab73090df8f6e89c554dfe26f0419.sol#1548) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- checkRole (/unique_chucks/31/0x29fdf8058fdab73090df8f6e89c554dfe26f0419.sol#1555-1558)
	- hasRole (/unique_chucks/31/0x29fdf8058fdab73090df8f6e89c554dfe26f0419.sol#1564-1572)
	- addRole (/unique_chucks/31/0x29fdf8058fdab73090df8f6e89c554dfe26f0419.sol#1575-1580)
	- removeRole (/unique_chucks/31/0x29fdf8058fdab73090df8f6e89c554dfe26f0419.sol#1588-1590)

Reentrancy in PlatinICO._deliverTokens (/unique_chucks/31/0x29fdf8058fdab73090df8f6e89c554dfe26f0419.sol#1799-1820):
	External calls:
	- _lockupReleases[0] = block.timestamp + tge.ICO_LOCKUP_PERIOD() (/unique_chucks/31/0x29fdf8058fdab73090df8f6e89c554dfe26f0419.sol#1807-1810)
	- PlatinToken(token).transferWithLockup(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount,_lockupReleases,_lockupAmounts,false) (/unique_chucks/31/0x29fdf8058fdab73090df8f6e89c554dfe26f0419.sol#1811-1817)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- lockup (/unique_chucks/31/0x29fdf8058fdab73090df8f6e89c554dfe26f0419.sol#1817)

Reentrancy in PlatinICO._processPurchase (/unique_chucks/31/0x29fdf8058fdab73090df8f6e89c554dfe26f0419.sol#1831-1843):
	External calls:
	- require(bool,string)(sold.add(_tokenAmount) <= tge.ICO_AMOUNT(),Can't be sold more than ICO amount.) (/unique_chucks/31/0x29fdf8058fdab73090df8f6e89c554dfe26f0419.sol#1835-1841)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- sold (/unique_chucks/31/0x29fdf8058fdab73090df8f6e89c554dfe26f0419.sol#1841)

elements.expression: require(bool,string)(sold.add(_tokenAmount) <= tge.ICO_AMOUNT(),Can't be sold more than ICO amount.)

analysis.description:
PlatinICO._deliverTokens (/unique_chucks/31/0x29fdf8058fdab73090df8f6e89c554dfe26f0419.sol#1799-1820) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-PlatinToken(token).transferWithLockup(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount,_lockupReleases,_lockupAmounts,false) (/unique_chucks/31/0x29fdf8058fdab73090df8f6e89c554dfe26f0419.sol#1811-1817)
	-PlatinToken(token).transfer(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/31/0x29fdf8058fdab73090df8f6e89c554dfe26f0419.sol#1817-1820)

PlatinICO.finalization (/unique_chucks/31/0x29fdf8058fdab73090df8f6e89c554dfe26f0419.sol#1848-1854) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-PlatinToken(token).transfer(tge.UNSOLD_RESERVE(),_unsold) (/unique_chucks/31/0x29fdf8058fdab73090df8f6e89c554dfe26f0419.sol#1851-1854)

PlatinTGE.constructor (/unique_chucks/31/0x29fdf8058fdab73090df8f6e89c554dfe26f0419.sol#752-805) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(_tgeTime >= block.timestamp,TGE time should be >= current time.) (/unique_chucks/31/0x29fdf8058fdab73090df8f6e89c554dfe26f0419.sol#757-758)

elements.expression: require(bool,string)(_tgeTime >= block.timestamp,TGE time should be >= current time.)
